---
title: "The Strengths and Limitations of Queer Data"
subtitle: "Academic contributions" 
date: July 2023
---

Kevin Guyan, the author of "Queer Data: Using Gender, Sex and Sexuality Data for Action" and I [discuss](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FX3E7VC2BrQ) who gets to be in the room to tell our stories, who should be in the room, and how to highlight queer joy within data.
